text: Welcome to the Nitrocosm visual novel engine.
This system uses JSON files as scripts.  Assets are loaded through these files as well.

name: Nitrocosm
text: All elements should be set or reset in the first section of each script.  Elements in subsequent sections are optional.

name: Nitrocosm
text: The name field is optional and is used to depict which character (or narrator) is speaking.
